summary: This mod will replace statue of Talos to... Lenin.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod will replace statue of Talos to Lenin. It made just for fun and can not be regarded as a political, socialist, and what any other promotion.

(As for me I took this as a kind of parallel. Lenin - the \"father\" of the Soviet. Talos - the \"father\" of Tamriel and hero of Skyrim.)

Installation 
To install this mod, extract (decompress) the .esp to your Skyrim directory.
(It will be something like *Installation directory*\\Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data)
Mark the box next to the mod in your mod manager.

Deinstalation
Just delete mod files from your dada folder.

Credits:
Thanks Mojave_Ranger for creating this mod.
You can find autor here (http://modgames.net/index/8-107209)
Original 3D model could be find here http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/architecture/lenin_statue/11-1-0-1405
author: Mojave_Ranger
